RelatedSentence: SAN ANTONIO ( AP ) San Antonio police say a 6 - year - old girl has died in an accidental shooting when she and her 8 - year - old sister were together while their mother was elsewhere in the home .
The Bexar ( bayr ) County Medical Examiner 's Office on Monday identified the girl who died as Jennilynn Montana .
A police statement says investigators are trying to determine whether the victim or her 8 - year - old sister pulled the trigger Sunday night .

A police statement Monday says the mother of the girls was in the front of the house when she heard a gunshot .

The mom went to the rear of the home and found the victim shot in the face .
Police did n't immediately say who owns the gun or any possible charges .
